replies.body: if you're any good at predicting worlds games you might have a chance. i'm pretty sure #1 prize this year was championship riven, i don't see why riot should change it up next year

I do remember reading a red post, (my memory is fading... don't take this as gospel) that explained that after a 4 year period, they might release Championship Riven as a bundle (with the other championship skins) for a limited time only.

To be honest, I doubt they would do it- the people that paid a considerable sum of money to acquire the skin would tear Riot games to shreds.
